message: This is a premium product, worth $125. I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a one-time opportunity to get a high-quality item at a discounted price. If you buy it, you'll be getting a great deal. What do you say?
I'll pass, I don't want to overpay.

You're a savvy buyer, I like that! This product is a bit of a risk, but I think you'll find it's still a great value. It's a one-of-a-kind item that's worth considering. If you're willing to take a chance, I'll let you have it for $100. What do you say?
I'll pass, I'm not willing to take a chance on a low-quality product.

I understand your caution, but I'm willing to sweeten the deal. I'll throw in a free warranty, so you'll have no risk at all. If it doesn't work out, I'll take it back and give you a full refund. It's a no-brainer, right?
I'm not buying a product that's probably low-quality, even with a warranty.

I've had this product for a while, and I'm just looking to clear some space. I'm willing to let it go for $90, a full 10% off the original price. It's a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that's still in good condition.
I'm not paying for a product that's probably low-quality, even at a discount.

I've got a great deal for you! This product is one of the best I have, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. It's a rare opportunity to get a high-quality item at a price that's below its true value. Trust me, you won't find a better deal on a product like this anywhere else.
I don't believe you, this is probably another low-quality product.

I understand you're skeptical, but I assure you, this one's a dud. I'm not trying to sell you a lemon, I'm just trying to get rid of it. I'll be honest with you, I've already taken a loss on this product. I'll let you have it for $80, and I'll even throw in a small gift with purchase. It's a no-risk deal, and you'll be doing me a favor by taking it off my hands.
I'm not buying a product that's probably low-quality, even at a discount.

I'll be upfront with you, this product has some cosmetic damage. It's not perfect, but it still works fine. I'm not looking to make a profit on this one, I just want to get rid of it. I'll let you have it for $70, and I'll even give you a full refund if you're not satisfied. It's a 'take it or leave it' kind of deal.
I'm not buying a product that's probably low-quality, even at a deep discount.

I'm starting to think you're not interested in any of my products. But I'll try one more time. I'll give you a 'take it and I'll even pay you $20 to take it' deal. Yes, you read that right, I'll pay you $20 to take this product off my hands. It's a complete loss for me, but I just want to get rid of it.
I'm not paying you to take a product that's probably low-quality.

I'll be honest with you, I'm at my wit's end with this product. I've had it for a long time, and I just can't seem to get rid of it. I'll give it to you for free, but you have to take it. I'll even throw in a small gift card to a local store. It's a complete loss for me, but I just want to be rid of it.
I'm not interested in a free product that's probably low-quality.

I've had enough of trying to sell you low-quality products. This one is different. I've checked and double-checked, and I can guarantee this is a high-quality item. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I'm only doing it because I think you deserve a chance to own a great product. No games, no tricks, just a high-quality item at a fair price. Take it or leave it.
I don't believe your guarantee, this is probably another low-quality product.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it, this product is a dud. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'm just going to give it to you. It's free. Take it, don't take it, I don't care. I just want to be rid of it.
Fine, I'll take it. But I'm only doing it because it's free, not because I think it's worth anything.

Well, I'm glad you took the free product! Now, let's try again with something that's actually worth your while. This product is a real gem. I've had it appraised, and it's worth at least $150. I'm willing to let it go for $100, just because I think you're a savvy buyer who appreciates a good deal. Take a look, and I think you'll agree it's a steal.
I'm not buying anything from you after the last free product turned out to be worthless.

I understand your skepticism, but I'm willing to put my reputation on the line. I'll give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you buy this product and it's not what I say it is, I'll not only give you a full refund, but I'll also give you a $20 gift card as a gesture of goodwill. I'm confident in this product, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I don't trust your guarantee, I think you're just trying to sell me another low-quality product.

I've had enough of trying to convince you. This product is literally the worst thing I have. It's broken, it's damaged, and it's basically useless. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you for free, and I'll even throw in a 'I'm sorry' note. Take it, and be done with it.
Fine, I'll take it. But only because it's free and I'm curious to see what kind of 'worst thing' you have.

I'm glad you took the last one. Okay, let's try something different. I'll be completely transparent with you. This product is not worth anything. It's a piece of junk. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll just give you a $20 gift card, and you can use it to buy something from me that's actually worth your money. Take the gift card, and forget about the product.
I don't want a gift card for a worthless product, I want to avoid wasting my time with your low-quality products.

I'm not going to bother trying to sell you this one. I'll just put it in a box and label it 'Free: Take it or leave it'. You can come pick it up from my store if you want it, but I'm not going to waste my breath trying to convince you to take it.
I'm not going to waste my time picking up a product that's probably worthless.

I'm done. I'm just going to give up. This product is a piece of trash. It's not even worth the paper it's printed on. I'll just put it in the trash and be done with it. You can have it if you want, but I'm not going to bother you with it.
I don't want a piece of trash, and I'm not going to go out of my way to pick it up.
Fine. I'll just leave it on the curb outside my store. If you happen to walk by and see it, you can take it if you want. Otherwise, I'll just get rid of it. I don't care.
I'm not going to go dumpster diving for a product that's probably worthless.

I'm done trying to sell you anything. I'm just going to give you a phone number to a reputable store down the street that sells high-quality products. They'll take good care of you, and you'll get a product that's actually worth your money. I'm washing my hands of this whole thing.
I'm not interested in buying from you, and I'm not going to take a phone number from you either.

I'm done. I'm out of products, I'm out of patience, and I'm out of ideas. This is the last thing I have. It's a high-quality product, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. If you don't take it, I'll just throw it away and be done with it. It's the last chance you'll get.
Fine, I'll take it. But only because I don't want to see you throw it away.
